Question
========
An object is moving in a circle with a constant speed. Its velocity is


Answerlist
----------
* tangent to the circle.
* constant.
* directed away from the centre of the circle.
* directed towards the centre of the circle.
* in the same direction as its acceleration.
* opposite the direction of its acceleration.


Solution
========
An object in uniform circular motion has a velocity that is always tangent to
the circle.
